body:
Comment 4: 
Ian: Good point. This requires a bit of designing, though. I suspect people would ask
almost immediately for (a) the ability to specify the filename in the source code
alongside the variable and (b) globbing. Both of these are delicate: (a) to learn the
filename, the Go command would need to parse the entire source instead of just up to the
package, and (b) naive globbing (into a map?) would require significantly more
compiler/linker coordination. This is probably a discussion to have on golang-dev, when
the 1.4 floodgates have been opened.

Chaishushan: I'm not sure that's the first design I would reach for, but thanks for the
link.
